comments:
I performed a refactoring to move an interface from inside a class to its own file. I got the following exception in the log.

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal.ProblemMarker
	at org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal.MarkerView$MarkerProcessJob.getExistingMarkers(MarkerView.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal.MarkerView$MarkerProcessJob.run(MarkerView.java:163)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java(Compiled Code))
This exception happens every time the view is refreshed. Restarting fixes the problem.
This has been fixed in build >20051010
